name: Bakery Blitz (Raydowbee)
description:
A simple platformer about a cat stealing bread from a bakery, made for my friend's birthday in one night. Play as a local cat that sneaks into a bakery to steal all of their delicious breads! <3

Besides the music, all assets were made by Raydowi (me)!

The song used in the game is Sonic Mania -- Lava Reef Zone 1, linked here:
